TEXT.TITLE: NIPPON SIGNAL TO ISSUE 50 MLN SWISS FRANC NOTES
TEXT.BODY: Nippon Signal Co Ltd is planning to issue 50 mln Swiss franc notes with warrants, lead manager Morgan Stanley and Co Inc said. It said details would be released tomorrow. REUTER
